100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

sentences.english: This paper focuses on free-interface component mode synthesis methods for damped vibration systems.
sentences.chinese: 研究了阻尼振動系統的自由界面子結構綜合法。

sentences.english: Based on the concept of dynamic sub-structures, the synthesis method in step-by-step is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 基於動態子結構的概念，提出了逐步模態綜合法。

sentences.english: Most of the prevalent modal synthesis methods are referred to as "single-level synthesis".
sentences.chinese: 當今國內外流行的模態綜合法都屬於“單級綜合法”。

sentences.english: Most of the prevalent modal synthesis methods are referred to as "single-level synthesis".
sentences.chinese: 當今國內外流行的模態綜合法都屬於“單級綜合法”。
